prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a muscular human male warrior, long wild black-green hair, fierce expression, torn battle outfit, standing in a power-charged stance, dramatic lighting, energy aura
feature_prompt: defined muscles, realistic skin texture, veins, battle scars, glowing green energy, dynamic hair movement, intense eyes, detailed fists
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, chibi, exaggerated eyes, plastic skin, flat lighting, CGI, low quality, deformed anatomy
